dependabot update -f input.yml --local . --updater-image ghcr.io/dependabot/dependabot-updater-silent
stderr 'created \| dependency-a \( from 1.2.3 to 1.2.4 \), dependency-b \( from 2.3.4 to 2.3.5 \)'
pr-created expected.json

-- manifest.json --
{
  "dependency-a": { "version": "1.2.3" },
  "dependency-b": { "version": "2.3.4" }
}

-- expected.json --
{
  "dependency-a": { "version": "1.2.4" },
  "dependency-b": { "version": "2.3.5" }
}

-- dependency-a --
{
  "versions": [
    "1.2.3",
    "1.2.4",
    "1.2.5"
  ]
}

-- dependency-b --
{
  "versions": [
    "2.3.4",
    "2.3.5",
    "2.3.6",
    "3.0.0"
  ]
}

-- input.yml --
job:
  package-manager: "silent"
  dependencies:
    - dependency-a
    - dependency-b
  source:
    directories:
      - "/"
    provider: example
    hostname: example.com
    api-endpoint: https://example.com/api/v3
    repo: dependabot/smoke-tests
  security-advisories:
    - dependency-name: dependency-a
      affected-versions:
        - < 1.2.4
      patched-versions: []
      unaffected-versions: []
    - dependency-name: dependency-b
      affected-versions:
        - < 2.3.5
      patched-versions: []
      unaffected-versions: []
  security-updates-only: true
